mapper.select: select COUNT(*) from freeboard join member on freeboard.member_id = member.member_id

select freeboard_category,member_nick,freeboard.member_id,freeboard_no,freeboard_title,freeboard_content,freeboard_writedate,freeboard_readno from freeboard join member on freeboard.member_id = member.member_id
order by freeboard_no desc limit #{startrow}, 15

select notice_category,member_nick,notice.member_id,notice_no,notice_title,notice_content,notice_writedate,notice_readno from notice join member on notice.member_id=member.member_id order by notice_no desc limit 0,5

select freeboard_no,freeboard_category,member_nick,freeboard.member_id,freeboard_readno ,freeboard_title,freeboard_writedate,freeboard_content from freeboard join member on freeboard.member_id = member.member_id where freeboard_no=#{freeboard_no}

select notice_no,notice_category,member_nick,notice.member_id,notice_readno ,notice_title,notice_writedate,notice_content from notice join member on notice.member_id = member.member_id where notice_no=#{notice_no}

choose.when: where member_nick like CONCAT('%', #{searchtxt}, '%') or freeboard_content like CONCAT('%', #{searchtxt}, '%') or freeboard_title like CONCAT('%', #{searchtxt}, '%')

mapper.select: select boardreply_no,freeboard_no,member_nick,boardreply_content,boardreply_writedate,boardreply.member_id from boardreply join member on boardreply.member_id=member.member_id where boardreply.freeboard_no=#{freeboard_no} order by boardreply_no
